trans-unit.source: Represents an element that has a value within a specific range.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有特定范围内的值的元素。

trans-unit.source: A RangeBase control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> that can be set between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: RangeBase 控件具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>，可以设置之间<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RangeBase visually indicates its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: RangeBase 直观指示其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the user can interactively set the value; in other cases, the value can be set only programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，用户可以以交互方式设置值;在其他情况下，可以仅以编程方式设置值。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>，但不是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，若要添加到或相减<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> determines how this property is used.
trans-unit.target: 继承自的控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>确定如何使用此属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property increases or decreases by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>属性增加或减少了是它的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When the user invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> commands on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> of the slider changes by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: 当用户调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A>上的命令<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty>是它的值的滑块更改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> does not use this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>不使用此属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.target: <>*1> 将添加到或从中减去<> *1> 的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 10.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>重写此属性的元数据并将其默认设置为 10。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 100.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>重写此属性的元数据并将其默认设置为 100。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: When overriding OnValueChanged in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s OnValueChanged method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写 OnValueChanged，一定要调用基类的 OnValueChanged 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Provides a string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that provides the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回提供的值的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current magnitude of the range control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置范围控件的当前数量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control visually indicates the Value property in some way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>控件以可视方式指示的值属性中某种方式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, the slider and scrollbar controls have a thumb that is synchronized with the Value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，滑块和滚动条控件具有 thumb 控件的值与同步。

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果将值设置为一个数字小于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>属性，值设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将值设置为一个数字，大于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>属性，值设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>
